content: the sleeves rm slip the 32 34 36 38 sleeve stitches onto a piece of scrap yarn rm m1 knit across the back rm slip the sleeve 32 34 36 38 stitches onto a piece of scrap yarn rm knit to the end 89 97 105 111 stitches row 11 ws knit 4 purl to the last 4 stitches knit 4 row 12 rs knit to the end row 13 ws knit 4 purl to the last 4 stitches knit 4 taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2 texture pattern on the main body − − − − − − − − − 17 knit on the rs purl on the ws − 16 ▬ purl on the rs knit on the ws − − − − − − − − − − − 15 14 row 14 rs knit to the end row 15 ws knit to the end row 16 rs knit 4 knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 5 knit 5 row 17 ws knit 4 purl 1 knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the last 4 stitches knit 4 repeat row 14 thru 17 until the body of the sweater measures 5 7 9 10 inches from the underarm end after working row 17 row 18 rs knit to the end row 19 ws bind off knitwise sleeves note - work each sleeve separately in the round and place a start of round marker 32 34 36 38 stitches leave a 6 tail so you can sew close the hole under each arm use the larger needle set up round knit to the end work the set up round 3 times total − 4 round 1 knit to the end − 3 round 2 purl to the end − − 2 round 3 knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the end 1 round 4 knit 1 purl 1 repeat to the end repeat rounds 1 thru 4 until the sleeve measures 4 ¼ 6 7 ½ 8 ½ inches from the under arm or to desired length end after round 4 round 5 knit to the end round 6 bind off purlwise repeat as worked for the 2nd sleeve finishing weave in your end sew the buttons on block and enjoy taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 3
